item.title: Checking PersistentVolumeClaims
item.description: user@example:~$ kubectl get pvc --all-namespaces NAMESPACE NAME STATUS VOLUME CAPACITY ACCESS MODES STORAGECLASS AGE testing-icasimpan-com vol-mysql-mysql-0 Bound pvc-bd199911-e0e5-4327-885d-4902a599ebe2 10Gi RWO do-block-storage 12m
